name: rTrakt
description: A Discord bot cog for interacting with the Trakt API
author: Subestro

commands.name: set_trakt_secrets
commands.description: Sets the Trakt client ID and client secret

commands.name: set_trakt_channel
commands.description: Sets the Trakt channel for sending error messages

commands.name: authorize_trakt
commands.description: Authorizes the bot to access the Trakt API
